= Project Description =
  * Full Name of Project (project tag is name of this page): Rapid Portals for Seismological Waveform Data
  * 10 second elevator pitch (how do you sell this to an early adopter?): The main aim of RapidSeis is to remove the barrier of uptake to the seismology community of an application for analysis of seismic waveform data. We will embed this application in a community gateway, which already exists in the form of a web portal.
  * Twitter description (120 characters laymen description, e.g. how would you describe this to your neighbour and not bore them): RapidSeis is building a community gateway to analyse seismology data using the revolutionary Rapid portal technology
